overview: The Municipality of Cavallino-Treporti, a strip of land enclosed between the Adriatic sea and the northern lagoon of Venice, invites a photographer of undisputed fame, as part of the Cavallino-Treporti Photography project, to re-read and investigate its extraordinary territory through the very personal and revealing lens of the camera and the unique sensitivity of the artist.
title: Vesper & Madrigals
